Trapped nearl

vocabulary.example: The miners heard a rumbling sound coming from the rocks before the collapse.

vocabulary.definition: the determination of the relative position of something or someone
vocabulary.example: The workers oriented themselves underground based on a level system.

vocabulary.definition: a machine or device that appears strange or unnecessarily complicated
vocabulary.example: The engineers devised a contraption to retrieve the broken drill bit from the borehole.
The miners' ordeal of being trapped underground for over two months was finally over.
The sense of hope permeated the atmosphere as the rescue operation progressed.

vocabulary.definition: no longer remembered or cared for
vocabulary.example: Once the media attention faded, the miners felt forgotten by the world.
